==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Arkhe-Powered
|desc_1      = Nimble Harvester Meks are powered by either {{Pneuma}} or {{Ousia}} and will use different attacks depending on their [[Arkhe]] alignment. Hitting it with the opposite Arkhe will cause it to lose Arkhe and become unable to use elemental attacks for a period of time.
|file_1_2    = Nimble Harvester Mek Arkhe-Powered 2

|name_2      = Drift
|desc_2      = This attack is used when Arkhe is unavailable. Rams the player once, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
}}

{{Enemy Attacks

}}

===Ousia — Geo===
{{Enemy Attacks

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial|Nimble Harvester Mek}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A clockwork meka designed to dig up and transport soil.<br>Due to the inherent ability of the local water and soil to store and transmit ousia and pneuma, clockwork meka powered by the annihilation of these energies are highly favored in [[Fontaine]]. This also explains why adventurers may come across Ousia and Pneuma Blocks from time to time.|[[Archive]]}}
